column5: do the sanctuaries open on june 15 or 16 in 09? last year they opened on the 15th but the previous years on the 16th.
Sancuaries open on June 15. See link for regs. http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR_E001324.pdf. Did they change the reg? Is there no longer a slot for 18-21? Can you keep one over 18" now?
Read the top right paragraph on page three of regs for exceptions and you'll find the 18"-21" slot still in effect.
